about_the_game:
"Mbembe Radio" is a horror adventure game where you explore the way home from school, encountering strange occurrences and challenges along the way.
The progression of the game includes elements of action and survival horror, where unexpected terrifying encounters may occur during exploration.

◆Story
The popular radio show among children, 'Mbembe Radio,' presents small challenges each episode.
After school, our protagonist, Kimi, lets out a small sigh. She has to walk through a dimly lit forest all alone on her way home.
a perfect challenge for Kimi was broadcasted on Mbembe Radio.
”I'll give you fun challenges for the next three days on your way home from school.”
Let's take on the challenges and make the journey home enjoyable.


◆Playtime
"Mbembe Radio" is a short game that lasts 20 to 60 minutes.

◆Ending
There are several endings.

◆Uploading and livestreaming Guidelines
